commits.content:
Bienvenue

prepare($sql); $messageStatement->execute(); $messages = $messageStatement->fetchAll(); foreach ($messages as $message) { // echo ""; // echo "" . $message['name'] . "
// " . $message['content'] . "
// " . $message['createdAt'] . "
"; // echo ""; $string = '
' . '' . '

' . $message['name'] . '

' . $message['content'] . '

' . ' ' . $message['createdAt'] . '' . '
'; echo $string; } ?> Document
